title: Define configurable behavioral triggers for NPS surveys
summary: Enable administrators to specify configurable behavioral triggers that determine when NPS surveys are presented to users, such as after onboarding or key feature adoption. This flexibility ensures targeted and relevant feedback collection based on user actions.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: auto-triggers NPS surveys based on configurable user behaviors (e.g., after onboarding, five logins, key feature adoption)

title: Implement logic to delay/suppress surveys on churn signals
summary: Develop system logic to detect churn risk and accordingly delay or suppress NPS survey prompts to affected users. This ensures surveys are not sent at inappropriate times, enhancing feedback quality and user experience.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: logic to delay or suppress prompts if churn risk is detected

title: Embed NPS prompt natively in web and mobile apps
summary: Integrate NPS survey prompts directly into both web and mobile applications, ensuring users receive feedback requests within the context of their normal workflow. This approach maximizes response rates and minimizes disruption.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: NPS surveys will be natively embedded in web/mobile apps to minimize workflow disruption

title: Design prompt retry and 30-day suppression after dismissal
summary: Establish logic to retry showing the NPS prompt if dismissed, while enforcing a 30-day suppression window to avoid user fatigue. This rule controls prompt frequency and improves user satisfaction.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: include suppression and retry rules after dismissals

title: Coordinate prompt delivery to prevent duplicates for multi-device users
summary: Synchronize NPS survey prompt delivery across multiple devices for the same user to ensure that prompts are not duplicated. This coordination improves user experience and avoids repetitive survey exposure.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: coordinate across devices to avoid duplicate prompts

title: Handle conflicting triggers by prioritization logic
summary: Create logic that resolves conflicts when multiple NPS prompt triggers activate simultaneously, using a prioritization scheme to determine which survey, if any, should be delivered. This maintains survey relevance and avoids overload.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Edge cases cover conflicting triggers and multi-device users

title: Ensure NPS prompt is minimally disruptive to user workflow
summary: Design the NPS prompt to integrate seamlessly into user workflows, minimizing interruptions and ensuring that feedback collection does not hinder productivity or user satisfaction.

title: Allow users to opt out of feedback requests at any time
summary: Implement a mechanism that gives users the ability to opt out of receiving feedback requests at any point, supporting both usability and compliance with privacy regulations.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Compliance with privacy regulations is required, including auditability and user opt-outs

title: Update product training and onboarding for NPS insights
summary: Revise product training materials and onboarding processes to incorporate new NPS insights for internal and customer-facing teams, ensuring proper usage and interpretation of survey data.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Documentation and enablement updates for teams are mandated

title: Provide internal team feedback mechanism to refine survey rules and content
summary: Establish a feedback mechanism for internal teams to suggest changes and improvements to NPS survey rules and content, fostering continuous refinement of feedback processes.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: a team feedback loop to refine rules

title: Visualize NPS response rates, scores, and trends by cohort and event
summary: Create analytics dashboards that display NPS response rates, scores, and temporal trends grouped by user cohort and triggering event. Enable insight into feedback reception and behavioral drivers of NPS within the SaaS product.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Analytics must visualize response rates and trends by cohort and event

title: Integrate NPS results with CRM and support for proactive outreach
summary: Connect NPS survey results to CRM and support systems to enable proactive customer engagement based on feedback. Triggers can automate outreach to users at risk or those providing critical feedback.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: NPS data must integrate with CRM/support workflows.

title: Ensure survey data storage and audit per privacy standards
summary: Implement survey data storage, retention, and audit processes to adhere to privacy regulations and user opt-out requirements. Ensure traceability and regulatory compliance for all stored NPS feedback.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Compliance with privacy regulations is required, including auditability and user opt-outs.

title: Integrate with analytics, CRM, and support ticketing platforms
summary: Establish robust two-way integrations with analytics platforms, CRM, and support ticketing systems to synchronize NPS data and workflow actions. Facilitates holistic feedback management and operational response.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Integration with analytics, CRM, and support platforms is required

title: Localize surveys for key markets
summary: Provide localized NPS surveys to accommodate multiple markets, ensuring linguistic and cultural accuracy. This supports better response rates and compliance with regional requirements.

title: Monitor and enforce KPIs: >20% response rate, 90% mapping, <24h follow-up
summary: Continuously track and enforce KPIs such as survey response rates above 20%, NPS mapping coverage over 90%, and ensuring follow-up actions occur within 24 hours. Automate alerts and operational checks on these metrics.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: KPIs specify survey response rates (>20%), NPS mapping, and fast follow-up (<24h)
